title: Silly Balloon Machine
info: The Silly Balloon Machine is a novelty furniture mechanism that produces red, blue, and green balloons continuously once placed. It can be activated and deactivated via wire, but is always on by default when first placed. Once placed, balloons are produced at short random intervals, and rise in the air until they encounter an obstacle like a block or platform. Balloons do not burst or disappear upon colliding with objects, but those do hinder their movement. All balloons fade away after approximately 10 seconds.
